citations.narrative:
Three shih-poo puppies DOB 2/5/2025 were acquired by the facility and transported in commerce on 4/1/2025 which is
one day before they are 8 weeks old. Two poodles with DOB 12/13/2024 (8 weeks old on 2/7/2025) were acquired and
transported by the facility on 2/4/2025 and then sold to a retail pet store on 2/6/2025.
Ensuring dogs are at least 8 weeks old and weaned prior to any transportation in commerce is required and helps
promote animal health. Ensure not to transport any dogs in commerce unless they are 8 weeks old and weaned.
***To correct from 4/9/2025 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.130 
   
Minimum age requirements. 
Three shih-poo puppies DOB 2/5/2025 were acquired by the facility and transported in commerce on 4/1/2025 which is 
one day before they are 8 weeks old. Two poodles with DOB 12/13/2024 (8 weeks old on 2/7/2025) were acquired and 
transported by the facility on 2/4/2025 and then sold to a retail pet store on 2/6/2025.  
Ensuring dogs are at least 8 weeks old and weaned prior to any transportation in commerce is required and helps 
promote animal health. Ensure not to transport any dogs in commerce unless they are 8 weeks old and weaned.  
***To correct from 4/9/2025 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
